about_the_game:
Why this game?

The Specialists, a Half-life mod last released in 2007 is the core reference, PreStrafe is a direct homage with means to create all of the exact movement mechanics turned into an official time trial game. This includes multi-directional diving, wall diving, wall flipping, somersaults, flips, ledge pulling, and the many aspects of GoldSrc movement mechanics. In this way, movement can be fine tuned for the eventual combat expansion and more.

Release and other features?

Plan is to release in late 2025 or even earlier, animations will take the most time and fine tweaking velocity, as well as the many maps and potential in-game level editor. Other features include cosmetics and other character customization, profile ranks, and rewards for top records.

When is the combat?

Melee, guns, gun-fu, bullet time, these are coming at a later date potentially under a different app.

name: PreStrafe

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64 bits)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4440 (3.10GHz)/AMD FX-6300 (3.50GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070/AMD Radeon RX Vega 56
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64 bits)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700 (3.20GHz)/AMD Ryzen 7 2700 (3.20GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 2070/AMD Radeon RX 6600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Wall jumping, bunny hopping, air strafing, surfing, and more, PreStrafe is a GoldSrc movement based time trial game, where your best records are competed against by other players. Play solo, with friends, or a public lobby.
